##Overview
This program predicts the MPG (Miles/(US) gallon) for your car based on the input parameters below

cyl:	 Number of cylinders

hp:	 Gross horsepower

wt:	 Weight (lb/1000)

am:	 Transmission (0 = automatic, 1 = manual)

gear:	 Number of forward gears

A linear regression model was built using **mtcars** dataset, and prediction was applied based on the input data.

**Keep adjusting the input values and click on "Submit" button to see the mpg predicted value.**

##Motor Trend Car Road Tests
The data was extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend US magazine, and comprises fuel consumption and 10 aspects of automobile design and performance for 32 automobiles (1973-74 models).

###Source
Henderson and Velleman (1981), Building multiple regression models interactively. Biometrics, 37, 391-411.
